caption.p: Triterpenoids isolated from the genus Euphorbia.

tr.td: E. neriifolia (ethyl acetate, leaves), E. schimperi (methanol, aerial), E. pterococca (acetone, whole plant)
Cytotoxic (MCF-7, C6), antiangiogenic, cytotoxic (MCF-7, HepG2, HCT-116), inhibitory (α/β-hydrolase 12)
